mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.username, u.img_url, SUM(p.amount) AS total_amount FROM user u JOIN post p ON u.user_no = p.user_no WHERE p.renew_status = true AND YEAR(p.transaction_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(p.transaction_date) = #{month} GROUP BY u.user_no ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_no, username, img_url FROM user WHERE mbti_name = #{mbtiName} AND user_no != #{userNo} ORDER BY renew_time DESC LIMIT 5
